law.catch_line: Prohibition against court or law enforcement agency retaining firearms or ammunition to prevent their transfer or sale.
law.text: No court or law enforcement agency shall retain a firearm or ammunition for official use for the purpose of avoiding transfer of the firearm or ammunition to the Department of Kentucky State Police under KRS 237.090 or 500.090, or other statute to avoid its being sold pursuant to KRS 16.220.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 326, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000.
